answers.answer: U know what you mean I thought i did my best

This has. Nothing to do with what you did or didn't do.  What happened was beyond your control.  I am so sorry you are having to go through this.  Please be kind to yourself.  I hope your heart heals quckly.

I miscarried when I was 17 weeks, my water broke, that was a month ago, I'm still depressed, I keep thinking that I didn't take care of myself and that's why I lost him, the dr said that it was probably I cought an infection, but I think it was because I didn't take care of myself, I'm obese, I had gestational diabetes, high blood pressure, and cholesterol, plus I have fibroids, and I wanna get pregnant so bad, I see all this women that got pregnant when I was and I see their belly growing and it breaks my heart, it makes me think that I would never be able to have a baby and that I would never give that happiness to my boyfriend, it was gonna be our first kid, so, you're not alone, I know ur situation is bad, but there are people with worse situations, like me, but good luck with u, and I hope u can get pregnant

question: I was 11weeks pregnant and i started to spot early sat morning, i called the doctor, he said its normal dont worry.But i did and went to the er and found out my babys heart stopped at9 weeks and 1day, They did a D/C but i feel i did something wrong i eat right exercised why do these things happen, my heart has broke.....This site is so full of kindnessGod bless everyone....
title: why do I blame myself
